mansion_foyer.imageDescription: The foyer is vast, with high ceilings and intricate wooden paneling. A grand chandelier, coated in cobwebs, hangs precariously above. Faded red carpet covers the floor, leading to a sweeping staircase. Portraits with stern visages line the dark, wood-paneled walls, and a large window lets in a sliver of moonlight, casting eerie shadows., rendered in pixel art style, 16-bit retro game aesthetic
